item.title: RAYE - Please Don't Touch
item.description:
One touch
I’m a victim
One look
in your eyes I’m in
One kiss
I’m addicted
One drink
and it’s sink or swim
I’m feeling vulnerable
what if I let go
You make me
want to though
The thing about love
it ain’t simple enough
The thing about trust
is it takes two of us
So if I let you
in here tonight
Hundred degrees
know you want to
But please
don’t touch me
If you
don’t mean it
The space
between our skin
Saying
more than enough
But once
you lay a finger
It can’t be
undone
So please
don’t touch me
If you
don’t mean it hey
You know
how it’s been
Yeah I’ve been
through enough
But once
you put your hands

undone

don’t touch me
